comments:

I can't replicate this error with simple projects.
I found a workaround - I deleted all my JUnit run configurations, and the export works like a charm.

Although I don't know how to reproduce it, this will fix:

ExportUtil, insert at line 418:
        if (javaProject == null) // bug 120804
            return found; 

If you are able to reproduce it, running the relevant testsuite in Eclipse will also fail, because I had to duplicate private code fragments. Write new bug against JUnit.
